blog.name: recoveryzine
blog.title: MHA Recovery Zine!
blog.description:
an upcoming MHA Charity zine that revolves around the recovery of students, heroes, civilians, and villains from their past battles, struggles and difficulties in life. 

Mobile links

summary: 🌟 WHY MALARIA? 🌟 Malaria remains as the most medically important parasitic infection in the world. Although the disease isn’t...
caption:
🌟 WHY MALARIA? 🌟

Malaria remains as the most medically important parasitic infection in the world. Although the disease isn’t contagious, it is a significant public health problem associated with poverty and it is one of the main obstacles to the economy of an endemic country. 

 ‪In addition to that, treatment for Malaria causes vicious side effects, adding to the severe signs and symptoms already being cased by the disease. ‬ 

 ‪Our aim is to extend this zine’s concept of “recovery” to areas where proper healthcare is not able to reach them. 

For more information, you can read up about the dangers of Malaria here.

Thank you so much and we look forward to your support!

Mods | Schedule | About | Specifications | Twitter

summary:
I have a proposal
Dabi and Tamaki are friends and goths in arms
Just imagine snarky punk goth dabi and awkward neutral goth...
body:
I have a proposal

Dabi and Tamaki are friends and goths in arms

Just imagine snarky punk goth dabi and awkward neutral goth Tamaki

Dabi is goth for the culture while tamaki just doesn’t like shopping so he usually just grabs what’s safest (black shirts) and then bolts

blog.name: tales-of-priscorum
blog.title: Priscorum
blog.description:
My name is Mel. If you're familiar with my GW2 fan projects (the GW2 Artist Collective and the Wintersday Zine), you'll know me as Zorav - one of ArenaNet's Creative Partners.

If you're more familiar with my writing, you'll know me under the tag of Priscorum, which is the world building story verse. I mostly post these to Patreon, but I will post occasional snippets and art here.

While I mostly do original writing (tagged with that), I also do some fandom writing which gets posted to this account as well, especially those published to fan compilations (I'm very random with what I choose to participate in).

This account will also have art things as I've been working on improving my techniques, but also I'll share tips and techniques that I stumble on. However, most of my repostings will go on my reblogging sideblog (zcreates).

Please excuse the dust while I redo some of the information here! I'll be moving all of my writing and organizing stuff here.

If you'd like to know anything, feel free to ask! Feel free to browse my art tag, as well as the links below.

I take no cuts from my projects. If you feel like supporting me, feel free to support my Patreon or buy me a coffee below!

summary: Burning Feathers - A Chinese Fenghuang Fairytale The sky is filled with lights soaring spirits that chase after the lanterns...
caption:
Burning Feathers - A Chinese Fenghuang Fairytale

The sky is filled with lights soaring spirits that chase after the lanterns that climb into the sunset.  The lights are warm, filled with promise, as the sky continues to darken until the only things that remain are the trails of lights that follow each wish as it’s carried away.

Hey everyone! I had the opportunity to write a short story for the @bnhamythszine project. Sara and I also designed all of the enamel pins (under @alchemyartgroup). It has definitely been a ride, but I’m so glad it’ll be coming to life in physical form soon!

The images for the story were done by the lovely @erinye - the style was such a perfect fit, and I’m so excited that I’ll get to meet her next month!! :D

We’ve hit our minimum for our first stretch goals! Feel free to grab a copy before sales end tonight!! (This is definitely a last minute thing, lol.)

summary:
Kirishima: I’m friendly, I’m loyal, I’m energetic, I... I just described a dog, didn’t I?
Sero: Well, yeah, but people love...
body:
Kirishima: I’m friendly, I’m loyal, I’m energetic, I… I just described a dog, didn’t I?

Sero: Well, yeah, but people love dogs.

summary: I absolutely LOVE the implication in bnha that if humans suddenly developed superhuman abilities, we --given preexposure to...
body: I absolutely LOVE the implication in bnha that if humans suddenly developed superhuman abilities, we –given preexposure to comic book media– would automatically and immediately become a Hero vs. Villain society, because what other course of action would we absolute foolish nerds take?

title: Class 1-D
description:
by water_flower

A bunch of kids find out they aren’t getting into the hero course. Principal Nezu pulls a gottem and angers like sixteen teenagers who are already pissed at everything. Sixteen teenagers need some serious depresso.
**
We also get introduced to a special character at the very end. She’s not here to fuck around fam. She ain’t got no time for anyone’s shit. She’s here to ruin Class 1-D’s day for no reason in particular … at least at the moment.
**
Have fun kiddos.
Get ready for some ~cRaZy~ antics.

Words: 3061, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Original Female Character(s), Original Male Character(s), Class 1-B (My Hero Academia), Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Class 1-C (My Hero Academia), Class 1-D - Character, Monoma Neito, Kaibara Sen, Awase Yousetsu, Kamakiri Togaru, Kuroiro Shihai, Kendou Itsuka, Kodai Yui, Komori Kinoko, Shiozaki Ibara, Shishida Juurouta, Shouda Nirengeki, Tsunotori Pony, Tsuburaba Kousei, Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu, Tokage Setsuna, Fukidashi Manga, Honenuki Juuzou, Bondo Kojirou, Yanagi Reiko, Rin Hiryuu, Kan Sekijirou | Vlad King, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Ishiyama Ken | Cementoss, Kayama Nemuri | Midnight, Ectoplasm (My Hero Academia), Aoyama Yuuga, Ashido Mina, Asui Tsuyu, Iida Tenya, Uraraka Ochako, Ojiro Mashirao, Kaminari Denki, Kirishima Eijirou, Kouda Kouji, Satou Rikidou, Shouji Mezou, Jirou Kyouka, Sero Hanta, Tokoyami Fumikage, Todoroki Shouto, Hagakure Tooru, Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Mineta Minoru, Yaoyorozu Momo, Shinsou Hitoshi, League of Villains (My Hero Academia), Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Toga Himiko, Dabi (My Hero Academia), Sensei | All For One, Iguchi Shuuichi | Spinner, Bubaigawara Jin | Twice, Sako Atsuhiro | Mr. Compress, Muscular (My Hero Academia), Hikiishi Kenji | Magne, Kurogiri (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Jirou Kyouka/Yaoyorozu Momo, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, There’s gonna be a lot of relationships imao, I’m not gonna tell u all of them tho, cause everything is a surprise
  • Additional Tags: Crack, Imao Class 1-D is hella salty, Class 1-A and 1-B will be included so don’t worry, Class 1-D is a bunch of original characters, I try not to have favorites but oops, Feel free to ship ppl i don’t mind, We have a strong female villain guys, I LOVE HER SO MUCH, Shenanigans are afoot, Lots of drama, relationship drama, Mystery, It’s like Scooby-Doo in this shit, I try to make it funny but oops, It gets sad sometimes but I try to not make it depresso, Come watch Class 1-D get made at literally everything, Class 1-B have nothing on these guys, If you thought Monoma was bad …, Buckle your seatbelts it’s gonna be a long ass ride, I’m out here for the gays tho, Like pretty much all of Class 1-A is gonna be gay, Probably some of my characters will be gay, I’ll stop with the tags it’s getting very long

  • Characters: Original Female Character(s), Original Male Character(s), Class 1-B (My Hero Academia), Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Class 1-C (My Hero Academia), Class 1-D - Character, Monoma Neito, Kaibara Sen, Awase Yousetsu, Kamakiri Togaru, Kuroiro Shihai, Kendou Itsuka, Kodai Yui, Komori Kinoko, Shiozaki Ibara, Shishida Juurouta, Shouda Nirengeki, Tsunotori Pony, Tsuburaba Kousei, Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu, Tokage Setsuna, Fukidashi Manga, Honenuki Juuzou, Bondo Kojirou, Yanagi Reiko, Rin Hiryuu, Kan Sekijirou | Vlad King, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Ishiyama Ken | Cementoss, Kayama Nemuri | Midnight, Ectoplasm (My Hero Academia), Aoyama Yuuga, Ashido Mina, Asui Tsuyu, Iida Tenya, Uraraka Ochako, Ojiro Mashirao, Kaminari Denki, Kirishima Eijirou, Kouda Kouji, Satou Rikidou, Shouji Mezou, Jirou Kyouka, Sero Hanta, Tokoyami Fumikage, Todoroki Shouto, Hagakure Tooru, Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Mineta Minoru, Yaoyorozu Momo, Shinsou Hitoshi, League of Villains (My Hero Academia), Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Toga Himiko, Dabi (My Hero Academia), Sensei | All For One, Iguchi Shuuichi | Spinner, Bubaigawara Jin | Twice, Sako Atsuhiro | Mr. Compress, Muscular (My Hero Academia), Hikiishi Kenji | Magne, Kurogiri (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Jirou Kyouka/Yaoyorozu Momo, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, There’s gonna be a lot of relationships imao, I’m not gonna tell u all of them tho, cause everything is a surprise
  • Additional Tags: Crack, Imao Class 1-D is hella salty, Class 1-A and 1-B will be included so don’t worry, Class 1-D is a bunch of original characters, I try not to have favorites but oops, Feel free to ship ppl i don’t mind, We have a strong female villain guys, I LOVE HER SO MUCH, Shenanigans are afoot, Lots of drama, relationship drama, Mystery, It’s like Scooby-Doo in this shit, I try to make it funny but oops, It gets sad sometimes but I try to not make it depresso, Come watch Class 1-D get made at literally everything, Class 1-B have nothing on these guys, If you thought Monoma was bad …, Buckle your seatbelts it’s gonna be a long ass ride, I’m out here for the gays tho, Like pretty much all of Class 1-A is gonna be gay, Probably some of my characters will be gay, I’ll stop with the tags it’s getting very long
trail.content:
by water_flower

A bunch of kids find out they aren’t getting into the hero course. Principal Nezu pulls a gottem and angers like sixteen teenagers who are already pissed at everything. Sixteen teenagers need some serious depresso.
**
We also get introduced to a special character at the very end. She’s not here to fuck around fam. She ain’t got no time for anyone’s shit. She’s here to ruin Class 1-D’s day for no reason in particular … at least at the moment.
**
Have fun kiddos.
Get ready for some ~cRaZy~ antics.

title: The Apprentice
description:
by SmolBeanBoy

Izuku is saved by a strange man that takes him out on the journey of his lifetime. But the man has some personal demands of him coming with him… Izuku is scared of what will happen and is caseous whe he follows the man.

summary: hey nerds what if Kurogiri was originally meant to be AFO’s heir? I mean, Shigaraki was a tool for him to take out his resenment...
body: hey nerds what if Kurogiri was originally meant to be AFO’s heir? I mean, Shigaraki was a tool for him to take out his resenment posthumously on nana shimura and on all might, but kurogiri? the way they talk is similar, the way they dress is similar, even the metal collar is similar to the detailing on AFO’s mask. Also, the warp quirk is generally a better quirk for a leader of villainous masses than a disintegration quirk, so like, what if? ive been thinking abt this for a month

summary: ¿Cómo Inició El Manga De Boku No Hero Academia? #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Manga
title: ¿Cómo Inició El Manga De Boku No Hero Academia? #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Manga
body:
¿Cómo Inició El Manga De Boku No Hero Academia? #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Manga

Los editores del manga de Boku no Hero Academia explican cómo fue que inició todo con esta serie, una de las más populares de Weekly Shonen Jump.

Actualmente, el manga de Boku no Hero Academia, o My Hero Academia como le dicen en Occidente, es uno de los más populares de la revista Weekly Shonen Jump. Es sin duda de una de las series más exitosas de la editorial Shueisha. Ha llegado muy lejos,…

View On WordPress

blog.name: obito-is-love
blog.title: Obito Is Love
blog.description: An anime blog solely dedicated to my favorite art form! The majority of my posts are queued so that I don't spam the dashboard, as well as screenshots and music from my favorite osts that I've posted here. I like to capture my favorite moments from every episode I watch, hence the multiple screenshots per post. Apologies in advance for my obsessive tendencies! I tend to marathon shows.

summary: Real talk you guys,  I love Natsuo sm and im lowkey hoping he is the ice villain. I've been wishing to see him get more involved...
body: Real talk you guys, I love Natsuo sm and im lowkey hoping he is the ice villain. I’ve been wishing to see him get more involved in the story, and if that means he has to be the villain, than so be it…if its true, its gonna be a hard fight to watch but also epic nonetheless.

blog.name: write-yourself-a-river
blog.title: All These Prompts And I Still Can't Find A Fic
blog.description:
This is a prompt blog. Most of these prompts will be by me and they'll be limited to fandoms I know.

Submissions are acceptable so long as they follow the rules, if not I'll just delete them.

summary: Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia Characters: Midoriya Izuku, AFO (implied at the very least) Warnings: well, there’s probably at...
body:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia
Characters: Midoriya Izuku, AFO (implied at the very least)
Warnings: well, there’s probably at least violence

Prompt: Izuku as a modern Robin Hood, using AFO to take quirks from the evil and granting them to the good.

- kunnskat on AO3
